string-array.name: description
string-array.item: food of Peru and the bold-flavours of Peruvian cuisine. Fish is delivered daily from Cornwall and the vegetable dishes make inventive use of seasonal British produce.
Spanish Restaurant/Bar Bringing the most popular dishes from Spain with a modern twist. Signature dishes include truffle tortilla, creamy croquettes,premium steak... and many more!
Kutir is from the stories of India’s wildlife and countryside, drawing influence from their early careers working in luxury properties nestled away in India’s forestry.
Dishes range from house-glazed Ham Yard ham and hand rolled pasta to chilli beans on toast and ice cream sandwiches and not forgetting the ever popular Champagne afternoon teas.
Enjoy our Mediterranean/ middle Eastern dishes with our signature Falafel or our well marinated Lamb chops grill, Lamb skewers
the world shares the same passion for good Italian food, made with high-quality and fresh ingredients to enjoy in small plates Food to share, pasta, pizza and salads.
menu is equally steak and seafood, receiving some of the freshest produce from Brixham Market and high standard UK beef, as well as cocktails made by award-winning bartenders.
